page.title: 07MORNING AT L.CROSBY SCHOOL
page.content: I get up, wash and get ready for school. Mum does my hair! Then I go for the{school bus}which leaves {Hightown}at 8.30a.m. On the bus, I meet Margaret who is our{bus supervisor.}When we get off, we play for a quarter of an hour in the playground. At 9.00a.m. we can come into school and do{English}or{Mathematics.}Mrs Barnes the Headteacher and Mrs Tumilty teach us. This is called {'Team-teaching'. Then at 10.30a.m. we go out to play. We have our{breaks}(e.g. biscuit) and play games. At 11.00a.m. we come back into school and do more work - perhaps {History}until 11.50a.m. which is lunchtime.
